text.author: Michael Klenk
text.title: Evolutionary Ethics
text.summary: A survey of evolutionary ethics presents arguments by philosophers including Michael Ruse and Sharon Street about whether objective moral facts about right and wrong exist, or whether what we view as moral is dictated by evolutionary forces which have shaped our genes.
